identified_features.reasoning: Two circular openings visible, one on top and one on the side of the part.
A long, narrow cut-out visible on the front face of the part.
A change in elevation visible on the top surface, creating a step-like feature.
A recessed area visible on the top surface, forming a pocket-like feature.
A curved transition visible on the outer edge of the part, indicating a fillet or round.
A raised cylindrical feature visible on the top surface, indicating a boss.
